snippet: Even as museums run by the Terra Foundation for American Art have closed, it has emerged as an alternative model for collectors contemplating museums of their own.
abstract: Terra Foundation for American Art, an influential organization that promotes American art through partnerships with other art institutions worldwide, has emerged as an alternative model for collectors contemplating museums of their own.
lead_paragraph: Even as museums run by the Terra Foundation for American Art have closed, it has emerged as an alternative model for collectors contemplating museums of their own.

headline.seo: Terra Foundation Extends Reach of American Art
headline.main: Spreading American Art Beyond Its Borders
headline.print_headline: Spreading American Art Beyond Its Borders
